              nay
              ,
               
              or
               
              both
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
Which
               
              modern
               
              lamentation
               
              might
               
              have
               
              moved
              ?

speaker: JULIET
text:
But
               
              with
               
              a
               
              rearward
               
              following
               
              Tybalt’s
               
              death
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
“
              Romeo
               
              is
               
              banishèd
              .
              ”
               
              To
               
              speak
               
              that
               
              word

speaker: JULIET
text:
Is
               
              father
              ,
               
              mother
              ,
               
              Tybalt
              ,
               
              Romeo
              ,
               
              Juliet
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
All
               
              slain
              ,
               
              all
               
              dead
              .
               
              “
              Romeo
               
              is
               
              banishèd
              .
              ”

speaker: JULIET
text:
There
               
              is
               
              no
               
              end
              ,
               
              no
               
              limit
              ,
               
              measure
              ,
               
              bound
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
In
               
              that
               
              word’s
               
              death
              .
               
              No
               
              words
               
              can
               
              that
               
              woe
               
              sound
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Where
               
              is
               
              my
               
              father
               
              and
               
              my
               
              mother
              ,
               
              nurse
              ?

speaker: NURSE
text:
Weeping
               
              and
               
              wailing
               
              over
               
              Tybalt’s
               
              corse
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
Will
               
              you
               
              go
               
              to
               
              them
              ?
               
              I
               
              will
               
              bring
               
              you
               
              thither
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Wash
               
              they
               
              his
               
              wounds
               
              with
               
              tears
              ?
               
              Mine
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              spent
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
When
               
              theirs
               
              are
               
              dry
              ,
               
              for
               
              Romeo’s
               
              banishment
              .
              —

speaker: JULIET
text:
Take
               
              up
               
              those
               
              cords
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Poor
               
              ropes
              ,
               
              you
               
              are
               
              beguiled
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
Both
               
              you
               
              and
               
              I
              ,
               
              for
               
              Romeo
               
              is
               
              exiled
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
He
               
              made
               
              you
               
              for
               
              a
               
              highway
               
              to
               
              my
               
              bed
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
But
               
              I
              ,
               
              a
               
              maid
              ,
               
              die
               
              maiden-widowèd
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Come
              ,
               
              cords
              —
              come
              ,
               
              nurse
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              to
               
              my
               
              wedding
               
              bed
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
And
               
              death
              ,
               
              not
               
              Romeo
              ,
               
              take
               
              my
               
              maidenhead
              !

speaker: NURSE
text:
Hie
               
              to
               
              your
               
              chamber
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              find
               
              Romeo

speaker: NURSE
text:
To
               
              comfort
               
              you
              .
               
              I
               
              wot
               
              well
               
              where
               
              he
               
              is
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
Hark
               
              you
              ,
               
              your
               
              Romeo
               
              will
               
              be
               
              here
               
              at
               
              night
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
I’ll
               
              to
               
              him
              .
               
              He
               
              is
               
              hid
               
              at
               
              Lawrence’
               
              cell
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
O
              ,
               
              find
               
              him
              !

speaker: JULIET
text:
Give
               
              this
               
              ring
               
              to
               
              my
               
              true
               
              knight

speaker: JULIET
text:
And
               
              bid
               
              him
               
              come
               
              to

              his
               
              last

              .
